019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
022import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Secret;
023import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1SecretList;
024import io.kubernetes.client.util.Watch.Response;
025import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.ListOptions;
026import java.io.IOException;
027import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.APP_NAME;
028import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sClient;
029import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sObserver.ResponseType;
030import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sV1SecretStub;
031import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET;
032import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.DisplaySecretChanged;
033import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
034import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
035
036/**
037 * Watches for changes of display secrets.
038 */
039@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
040public class DisplaySecretsMonitor
041        extends AbstractMonitor<V1Secret, V1SecretList, VmChannel> {
042
043    /**
044     * Instantiates a new display secrets monitor.
045     *
046     * @param componentChannel the component channel
047     */
048    public DisplaySecretsMonitor(Channel componentChannel) {
049        super(componentChannel, V1Secret.class, V1SecretList.class);
050        context(K8sV1SecretStub.CONTEXT);
051        ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
052        options.setLabelSelector("app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME + ","
053            + "app.kubernetes.io/component=" + COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET);
054        options(options);
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    protected void prepareMonitoring() throws IOException, ApiException {
059        client(new K8sClient());
060    }
061
062    @Override
063    protected void handleChange(K8sClient client, Response<V1Secret> change) {
064        String vmName = change.object.getMetadata().getLabels()
065            .get("app.kubernetes.io/instance");
066        if (vmName == null) {
067            return;
068        }
069        var channel = channel(vmName).orElse(null);
070        if (channel == null || channel.vmDefinition() == null) {
071            return;
072        }
073        channel.pipeline().fire(new DisplaySecretChanged(
074            ResponseType.valueOf(change.type), change.object), channel);
075    }
076
077}
